definition: argot/bandits' secret jargon/malicious words
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
black/dark/sinister/secret/shady/illegal/to hide (sth) away/to vilify/(loanword) to hack (computing)
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Slang is the tongue of those who sit in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 黑話是黑暗中人的語言。
黑話，便是語言中的苦役犯。

sentences.english: By this time I had begun to understand the meaning of their terms.
sentences.chinese: 直到這會兒我纔開始明白他們所說的一些黑話的意思。

sentences.english: What is the use of preserving slang?
sentences.chinese: 把黑話保留下來有什麼好處呢？

sentences.english: What is the good of assisting slang "to survive"?
sentences.chinese: 讓黑話“倖存下去”有什麼好處呢？

definition: red in the face/extremely angry
spendthrift/wastrel/prodigal
hypocrite
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge

lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
